title: Jerrybox Arthritis Gloves Fingerless Copper Gloves Compression Medical Support Gloves
description: Jerrybox premium nylon gloves is your best choice! With its excellent support and complete compression, this gloves is suitable for sports, athletic activities, pain relief, and everyday comfort. The copper fiber material is an innovative high-tech processing functional fiber with anti-bacterial, deodorant, self-cleaning and anti-mite properties. This premium technique boasts a durable and comfortable material with great advantages for improving your immune system and overall health. This comfortable gloves offers you soothing and breathable knee compression. It also provides extra protection while giving you a snug yet flexible fit during the day and night, and all activities and seasons. This product is available in five convenient sizes (M, L, XL) for both men and women. You'll be sure to find a perfect and comfortable fit, or we'll refund your purchase! 1. Soft, durable and anti-slip design to keep its elasticity and effectiveness. 2. High-performance combined materials to provide maximum compression and support for knee joints during and between workouts. 3. Ergonomically designed for a full range of motion with superior comfort and smoothness. 4. Minimizes injury and offers rejuvenating relief from arthritis, aches and pains. 5. Keeps your knees comfortable and warm, increases blood flow and aids with joint and muscle recovery.
